downloads_jumbotron_paragraph_1: Installiere unsere Erweiterung in deinem Browser und bekomme direkt Informationen zu Datenschutzerklärungen auf den Seiten, auf denen du unterwegs bist!
frontpage_intro_bottom_text: Terms of service are often too long to read, but it's important to understand what's in them. Your rights online depend on them. We hope that our ratings can help you get informed about your rights. Do not hesitate to click on a service below, to have more details! You can also get the ratings directly in your browser by installing our web browser add-on:
frontpage_intro_button_contribute: Trage zu dem Projekt auf Phoenix bei!
frontpage_intro_top_text: We are a user rights initiative to rate and label website terms & privacy policies, from very good Class A to very bad Class E.
frontpage_jumbotron_text: “I have read and agree to the Terms” is the biggest lie on the web. We aim to fix that.
help_expanding: Help expanding this list by contributing on Phoenix!
redirect_notice: Hello! You might have wondered how you got here. We are currently testing our new site with 25% of the visitors, which apparently included you! If you would like to give us Feedback, head over to our GitHub and create an issue there!
